title: "NEA exploring table-cleaning robot at hawker centres to support manual labour"
excerpt: "A two-month trial of the robot will be conducted at a suitable hawker centre here and stallholders there will not need to bear any costs of the trial, an NEA spokesman told The Straits Times. Observers said the robot could help to meet the manpower crunch as the cleaning workforce ages,"
